snippet.title: Space Engineers 2 Official Alpha Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Engineers, prepare for liftoff! Today marks a monumental leap in the Space Engineers saga. We are thrilled to announce Space Engineers 2, the revolutionary next chapter in space simulation gaming.
Creation & Destruction Never Felt This Good!

🤩 Preorder Now & Play on Steam on January 27, 2025 - https://2.spaceengineersgame.com/store/
🗺️ Roadmap: https://2.spaceengineersgame.com/roadmap-2/#current
➡️ Connect and find us on your platform of choice - https://www.keenswh.com/connect/  

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Space Engineers 2 is an open world sandbox game where engineering meets exploration, construction, and survival in the vastness of space. Become a pioneer in the distant Almagest system, a new uncharted world with infinite possibilities for creativity and discovery. Build everything from starships to space stations as you craft your own path in this highly anticipated next chapter of the Space Engineers series!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

😁 Join the Community - https://discord.gg/keenswh

🛡️ Feedback & Support - https://support.keenswh.com/

✅ Game Guides - https://2.spaceengineersgame.com/game-guide/

📝 Community Code of Conduct - https://2.spaceengineersgame.com/community-code-of-conduct/
